title: Supervisor Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
KIYIX is a recruitment/Hr Consulting firmand our goal is to help create one million jobs in Nigeria by 2030. At Kiyix recruitment hub, we help make recruitment a stress-free experience for both the employer and the potential job seekers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supervisor

Job Location: Oyingbo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking an experienced Supervisor to oversee our FMCG operations in Lagos.
	As a Supervisor, you'll be responsible for managing a team of sales representatives, ensuring effective customer service, and driving sales growth¹.


Key Responsibilities


	Team Management: Supervise a team of sales representatives, providing guidance and support to ensure sales targets are met.
	Customer Service: Ensure excellent customer service, resolving customer complaints and addressing their needs.
	Sales Growth: Develop and implement strategies to drive sales growth, expand customer base, and increase market share.
	Inventory Management: Manage inventory levels, track sales, and report on customer feedback.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in sales or a related field in the FMCG sector
	Proven leadership and team management skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their application, including their Resume to: kicvacancy@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more inquiries, contact via WhatsApp 09063916949.

title: Sales / Admin Officer Job at Courier and Logistics Management Institute
content:
Courier & Logistics Management Institute (CLMI) - Welcome to CLMI - Your Gateway to Premier Education and Professional Development. The Ultimate Platform to Launch and Sell Your Courses Online, Equipped with Comprehensive eCommerce Features.

At CLMI, we offer an unparalleled LMS platform where you can sell courses and gain professional insights into courier, logistics, transport, and management. As the world’s only professional body offering all four categories together, we provide knowledge from global experts and industry leaders. Elevate your educational and professional standing in society with CLMI.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Admin Officer
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a dynamic, driven, and resourceful Marketing/Admin Officer to join our growing team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about sales, business growth, and efficient office administration.
	The primary focus of this position is sales and customer acquisition— the successful candidate will actively generate leads, onboard new customers, and drive revenue while earning attractive commissions in addition to a basic monthly salary.
	You will also handle essential administrative responsibilities to ensure smooth day-to-day office operations.


Key Responsibilities
Marketing & Sales:


	Identify and secure new customers for CLMI programs and services.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with prospects and existing clients.
	Achieve monthly sales targets and earn commissions on successful conversions.
	Proactively promote CLMI’s training programs, certifications, and academic offerings.
	Develop creative sales strategies to drive customer engagement and enrollment.


Administrative Tasks:


	Provide general administrative support to the office and management team.
	Manage office records, documentation, and correspondence.
	Coordinate meetings, schedules, and internal communications.
	Support daily operational tasks to ensure office efficiency.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related fields.
	Strong interest in sales with proven ability (or desire) to close deals and meet targets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Basic administrative and organizational skills.
	Self-driven, goal-oriented, and able to work independently.
	Prior experience in marketing or administrative roles is an advantage.


What We Offer


	Basic monthly salary
	Commission on every successful customer acquisition
	Growth opportunities within a reputable professional institute
	A supportive work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: simon_emeje@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subejct of the mail.

Job Locations: Ikorodu, Mushin - Lagos and Sango Ota - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Operations Manager Job at 5thWall Consulting
content:
At 5thWall Consulting, we are a dynamic outsourcing firm dedicated to providing end-to-end recruitment solutions for businesses across various industries. We specialize in helping organizations attract, assess, and hire top talent that aligns with their goals and culture.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager

Job Location: Lekki-Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an experienced Operations Manager to oversee the day-to-day activities of our real estate company.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the smooth operation of our business, driving process improvements, and leading cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives.


Key Responsibilities
Operational Management:


	Oversee daily operations, ensuring efficient execution of projects and transactions.
	Develop and implement operational processes and procedures to improve productivity and quality.
	Identify and mitigate operational risks, ensuring compliance with industry regulations.


Team Leadership:


	Manage and lead cross-functional teams, including administrative, sales, and customer service staff.
	Foster a positive and productive work environment, promoting teamwork and collaboration.
	Develop and implement training programs to enhance team performance and skills.


Process Improvement:


	Analyze operational processes, identifying areas for improvement and implementing changes.
	Develop and implement metrics to measure operational performance, tracking progress and make data-driven decisions.
	Collaborate with senior management to develop strategic plans and objectives.


Stakeholder Management:


	Build and maintain relationships with internal stakeholders, including employees, management, and other departments.
	Ensure effective communication with external stakeholders, including clients, realtors and partners.


Performance Monitoring:


	Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure operational performance.
	Identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Real Estate, or a related field with 6-8 years of experience.
	Proven experience in operational management, preferably in real estate.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent communication and leadership skills.


Key Skills:


	Strong leadership and management skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to analyze and improve operational processes
	Strategic thinking and problem-solving skills
	Attention to detail and organizational skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other productivity software


Competences:


	Operational management and process improvement
	Leadership and team management
	Strategic planning and execution
	Problem-solving and analytical thinking
	Communication and stakeholder management
	Adaptability and flexibility in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N500,000 - N600,000 / Month.
